column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services express sympathy condolences photos lucille lorene voiles, age 87 of allardt, passed away on wednesday, june 10, 2015 at signature health care of fentress co. funeral service will be saturday, june 13, 2015 at 12 noon at the jennings funeral homes chapel in jamestown. burial will follow in the fellowship cemetery. the family will receive friends on saturday, june 13, 2015 from 10:00 am to 12 noon jennings funeral homes chapel in jamestown. she is survived by her: daughter, sandra tompkins and husband keith of allardt 2 sons, tom voiles and wife paula of oneida lanny voiles of white bluff, tn sister, irene bridges of allardt 8 grandchildren, alice, andy, chris, brian, brandon, heather, lance & jeremiah a host of great and great great grandchildren she is preceded in death by her: husband-cecil voiles son-nathan voiles father-arthur chitwood mother-hettie (bridges) chitwood 2 sisters and 2 brothers in lieu of flowers, the family request donations to the fellowship cemetery fund and they may be left at jennings funeral homes. jennings funeral homes of jamestown in charge of services for lucille lorene voiles of allardt. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products. click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. jann lewis posted thu june 11, 2015 tommy and paula and family... my love and prayers are with you all during the loss of your mom. all my love. add condolence
